string-array.name: version_changelog
string-array.item: \u2022 You can now change some settings from your watch
\u2022 App Theme changing has been reworked, with more options
\u2022 The app\'s accent colour is now purple
\u2022 Icons are now outline variants where possible
\u2022 Battery Sync and Do not Disturb Sync have been moved to their own screens
\u2022 You can now sync Do not Disturb state with Theater Mode on your watch
\u2022 Dialog themes should be more consistent now
\u2022 Fixed a bug where you could get stuck infinitely loading when trying to enable \'Phone to Watch Sync\' in DnD Sync
\u2022 Reduced the occurrence of crashing when tapping on the DnD Sync notification
\u2022 Fix a potential RemoteServiceException when performing an action like updating battery stats from your watch
